meanings.definition: The act of bringing a previously privatized industry or service back under state control.
meanings.sent1: The renationalization of the railway system ensured that it was now managed by the government.
meanings.sent2: The renationalization of the healthcare sector was a strategic move by the country's leaders.
meanings.sent3: After the renationalization of the internet service providers, everyone had to adjust to the new rules.
meanings.sent4: The renationalization of the energy sector sparked a heated debate among policymakers.
meanings.sent5: The renationalization of the postal service was met with mixed reactions from the public.

meanings.definition: The process of returning a company or organization to national ownership or control.
meanings.sent1: Renationalization of the airline industry was a major decision made by the government.
meanings.sent2: The renationalization of the telecommunications company was completed smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The renationalization of the toy company led to some interesting marketing strategies.
meanings.sent4: The renationalization of the tech giant symbolized a shift in economic policies.
meanings.sent5: Renationalization of the media conglomerate brought about significant changes in the industry.
